features.header_subtitle: Every architectural decision in SmartCam was made to protect citizens first and deliver municipal intelligence second. Here is what makes us fundamentally different.
features.item1_title: No Image Ever Leaves the Camera
features.item1_content: Every frame of video is analysed by the on-board AI processor in real-time and then immediately destroyed. Only anonymous metadata — like vehicle counts or occupancy status — ever leaves the device. There is no cloud server storing your city's footage. There is nothing to hack or leak.
features.item2_content: Unlike big-tech surveillance platforms, SmartCam operates on a zero data brokerage model. The council owns the hardware. The council owns the anonymous analytics. We never sell, rent, or monetize your data. Full GDPR compliance is guaranteed by architecture, not just policy.
features.item3_content: Our gimbal-equipped cameras operate autonomously, scanning and analysing environments 24/7 without human intervention. When a situation demands it, a trained operator can take full manual control of the camera, accessing a live video feed in real-time. The moment the operator releases control, the camera returns to autonomous Edge AI mode — no footage is ever stored or retained.

privacy_exp.title: Why Edge AI is the Ethical Choice
privacy_exp.subtitle: A non-technical guide to how our cameras protect citizen identities while keeping your city smart.
privacy_exp.card1_title: What Happens in the Camera, Stays in the Camera
privacy_exp.card1_desc: Traditional security cameras stream raw video showing people's faces all day long. Our "Edge AI" cameras are different. They act like an eye and a brain combined. The camera looks at the street, counts the cars or detects a problem, and then immediately deletes the video. It only sends an anonymous text alert (like "3 cars in the junction") back to the council. No faces are ever recorded or transmitted.
privacy_exp.card2_desc: We've all seen the news about massive companies suffering data breaches, exposing the private information of millions. Because our cameras process everything locally on the device (the "edge") and never send raw video to a central cloud server, there is no high-value database for hackers to steal. You can't leak what you don't store.
privacy_exp.card3_desc: Big tech corporations have a long history of collecting your data to sell to advertisers or third-party data brokers. Our solution is built on edge computing technology. The council owns the hardware, and the council owns the anonymous data. There are no hidden backdoors, no secretive advertising profiles, and absolute compliance with European GDPR laws.

privacy_policy_page.title: Privacy Architecture
privacy_policy_page.intro: At SmartCam Solutions, privacy is not an afterthought—it is the foundational design principle of all our municipal technologies. This document details how our Edge AI systems operate to ensure the total anonymity and protection of citizens in public spaces.
privacy_policy_page.flow_subtitle: From the moment light hits the camera lens to the data arriving at your dashboard, here is exactly what happens—and what doesn't.
privacy_policy_page.flow_step1_desc: The camera captures a live video feed of the environment, just like any standard camera.
privacy_policy_page.flow_step2_desc: The on-board processor analyses the feed locally in real-time, extracting only anonymous metadata.
privacy_policy_page.flow_step3_desc: The raw video is instantly discarded from memory. It is never stored, streamed, or transmitted.
privacy_policy_page.flow_step4_desc: Only anonymous data like '3 cars detected' or 'slot occupied' is sent to your dashboard.
privacy_policy_page.details_subtitle: Each principle below is an architectural guarantee, not just a policy statement.
privacy_policy_page.s1_body: Unlike traditional security cameras, our systems do not stream, record, or store raw video feeds. We do not use facial recognition technology. We do not track individuals across public or private spaces. We do not collect personally identifiable information (PII) from the general public.
privacy_policy_page.s2_body: Our hardware utilizes Edge AI. This means all video analysis happens locally on the camera's internal processor in real-time. The camera views the environment, extracts the necessary analytical metadata (e.g., '3 vehicles detected' or 'parking space occupied'), and then instantly deletes the source video from memory.
privacy_policy_page.s3_body: The only data transmitted from our devices to municipal control centers (such as a Grafana dashboard) is anonymous, aggregated metadata consisting of timestamps, coordinates, and generic event classifications. This data cannot be reverse-engineered to identify any individual.
privacy_policy_page.s4_body: Our architecture is designed from the ground up to achieve out-of-the-box compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other stringent European privacy laws. Because our systems do not process or retain personal data, the regulatory burden on municipalities deploying our technology is significantly minimized.
privacy_policy_page.s5_body: SmartCam Solutions operates on a strict zero data brokerage model. We do not sell, rent, or monetize analytics data. The anonymous metadata generated by the hardware is the sole property of the municipality or organization that deployed it.
privacy_policy_page.s6_body: Because our system does not collect or store personal data, there is inherently no personal data to request, modify, or delete. Citizens in areas monitored by our cameras are never identified, tracked, or profiled. The system is designed to be privacy-compliant by default, with no opt-out required.
privacy_policy_page.contact: For any inquiries regarding our data handling or privacy architecture, please contact our engineering team.
